00317 class NonbondedForce::ExceptionInfo {
00318 public:
00319     int particle1, particle2;
00320     double chargeProd, sigma, epsilon;
00321     ExceptionInfo() {
00322         particle1 = particle2 = -1;
00323         chargeProd = sigma = epsilon = 0.0;
00324     }
00325     ExceptionInfo(int particle1, int particle2, double chargeProd, double sigma, double epsilon) :
00326         particle1(particle1), particle2(particle2), chargeProd(chargeProd), sigma(sigma), epsilon(epsilon) {
00327     }
